dotnetType.name: GuidResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.UuidResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Guid" />; an
            unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GuidResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
